sense.def: Alternative Writing geng gu 哽骨 ; gu geng 骨鯁 ; gu geng 骨 骾. Pathological Condition of an animal bone stuck in the throat and causing choking, with major signs including throat closure with pain, inability to swallow, and an inability to dislodge the bone. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 8: 療食諸肉骨哽方，白雄雞左右翮大毛各一枚燒 末，水服一刀圭也 , “Recipe to cure choking on a bone when eating meat: burn one feather of the left and right wings of a white rooster to a powder and ingest with water the amount one can scoop up with a knife’s blade. Excellent”.
